select t.id, t.order_no, t.from_no, t.cMemo, t.CreateDate from ( select max(t1.id) as id, t1.order_no, t1.from_no, t2.Description as cMemo, t2.CreateDate from ribon_mes.dbo.production_test_so_list t1 left join mps_plancode t2 on t1.order_no = t2.PlanCode where t1.iz_delete = 0
and t1.order_no like '%' + #{query.orderNo} + '%'
and t1.from_no like '%' + #{query.fromNo} + '%'
and t2.Description like '%' + #{query.cmemo} + '%'
and t2.CreateDate >= #{query.dateStart}
and t2.CreateDate < #{query.dateEnd}
group by t1.order_no, t1.from_no, t2.Description, t2.CreateDate) t order by t.CreateDate desc, t.order_no

select MAX(matsort.id) id, ComputationUnit.cComunitName unit,matsort.order_no orderNo, max(con_no) conNo, matsort.ps_code invCode,case when SUM(qtys) is null then 0 else SUM(qtys) end orderQty, Inventory.cInvName invName,Inventory.cInvStd invStd,mat_size matSize, case when pro_type is null then '' else pro_type end proType, matsort.from_no fromNo, ppo.Description as cmemo, Inventory.i_id as iid, (select sum(iQuantity) from Rdrecords11 where cmocode = matsort.order_no and cInvCode = matsort.ps_code) as outQty, (select sum(iQuantity) from CurrentStock where cWhCode = '01' and cInvCode = matsort.ps_code) as curQty from ribon_mes.dbo.production_test_so_list matsort left join Inventory Inventory on Inventory.cinvcode=matsort.ps_code left join ComputationUnit ComputationUnit on Inventory.cComUnitCode=ComputationUnit.cComunitCode left join mps_plancode ppo on MatSort.order_no=ppo.PlanCode where qtys>0 and case when iz_delete is null then 0 else iz_delete end = 0 and (pro_type='金工' or pro_type='外购' or pro_type='半成品' or (case when pro_type is null then '' else pro_type end = '' and Inventory.bPurchase = 1)) and order_no=#{orderNo}
and matsort.pro_type = '金工'
and matsort.pro_type = '半成品'
and (matsort.pro_type = '外购' or (case when matsort.pro_type is null then '' else matsort.pro_type end = '' and Inventory.bPurchase = 1))
group by ComputationUnit.cComunitName,order_no,ps_code,Inventory.cInvName,Inventory.cInvStd,mat_size, case when pro_type is null then '' else pro_type end,matsort.from_no,ppo.Description, Inventory.i_id order by case when pro_type is null then '' else pro_type end,ps_code
select id, order_no, from_no from ribon_mes.dbo.production_test_so_list where id = #{id}

select t.id, t.order_no, t.from_no, t.cMemo, t.CreateDate from ( select max(t1.id) as id, t1.order_no, t1.from_no, t2.Description as cMemo, t2.CreateDate from ribon_mes.dbo.production_test_so_list t1 left join mps_plancode t2 on t1.order_no = t2.PlanCode left join Inventory inv on t1.ps_code = inv.cInvCode where t1.iz_delete = 0 and t1.order_no = #{orderNo}
and t1.pro_type = '金工'
and t1.pro_type = '半成品'
and (t1.pro_type = '外购' or (case when t1.pro_type is null then '' else t1.pro_type end = '' and inv.bPurchase = 1))
group by t1.order_no, t1.from_no, t2.Description, t2.CreateDate) t

select id, unit, orderNo, invCode, orderQty, invName, invStd, matSize, proType, fromNo, outQty, orderQty - case when outQty is null then 0 else outQty end as unOutQty, (select sum(iQuantity) from CurrentStock where cWhCode = '01' and cInvCode = t.invCode) as curQty from ( select MAX(matsort.id) id, ComputationUnit.cComunitName unit,matsort.order_no orderNo, matsort.ps_code invCode,case when SUM(qtys) is null then 0 else SUM(qtys) end orderQty, Inventory.cInvName invName,Inventory.cInvStd invStd,mat_size matSize, case when pro_type is null then '' else pro_type end proType, matsort.from_no fromNo, (select sum(iQuantity) from Rdrecords11 where cmocode = matsort.order_no and cInvCode = matsort.ps_code) as outQty from ribon_mes.dbo.production_test_so_list matsort left join Inventory Inventory on Inventory.cinvcode=matsort.ps_code left join ComputationUnit ComputationUnit on Inventory.cComUnitCode=ComputationUnit.cComunitCode left join mps_plancode ppo on MatSort.order_no=ppo.PlanCode where qtys>0 and case when iz_delete is null then 0 else iz_delete end = 0 and (pro_type='金工' or pro_type='外购' or pro_type='半成品' or (case when pro_type is null then '' else pro_type end = '' and Inventory.bPurchase = 1)) and matsort.order_no=#{orderNo} and Inventory.i_id = #{barcode} group by ComputationUnit.cComunitName,order_no,ps_code,Inventory.cInvName,Inventory.cInvStd,mat_size, case when pro_type is null then '' else pro_type end,matsort.from_no) t where orderQty - case when outQty is null then 0 else outQty end > 0
